meanings.sent1: She was forfending her little brother from the bullies at school.

meanings.sent3: The cat was forfending the house from the pesky mice.

meanings.definition: Ward off or prevent something from happening
meanings.sent1: He tried forfending the cold by wearing a thick coat.
meanings.sent2: The scarecrow forfended the birds from eating the crops.
meanings.sent3: The superhero forfended the city from the evil villain.
meanings.sent4: The vaccine forfends diseases from infecting the body.
meanings.sent5: The lock forfends intruders from entering the house.
